actions.recommendation: Resting & stress ECG shows abnormalities. Cardiologist review is recommended.
Improve fitness by doing varied exercise types while keeping your heart rate between 161-176 bpm.
Continue eating a diet high in fresh fruit & veggies. Limit food high in saturated fats. Keep sugar intake low.
Breathing exercises, mindfulness exercises & relaxation techniques may help improve anxiety.
Calciferol , Biogen Immune Booster , Finpecia  , Minoxidil

BMI at 27 & waist-to-height ratio at 53% are slightly elevated. This increases the risk of conditions like diabetes & hypertension. Aim to keep your BMI between 18.5-24.9 & waist-to-height ratio below 50%.
